subject: Self Care
title: Giving Feedback With EQ
description: Learn Giving Feedback With EQ in one minute.

hook.text: 'Great job but...' The word 'but' erased the compliment. Every word after it felt like a trap to the listener.

buildup.text: The feedback sandwich â€” praise, criticism, praise â€” is transparent and patronizing. People see through it instantly.

discovery.text: Effective feedback is specific, timely, and behavior-focused. 'In the meeting, when you interrupted, the client froze.'

twist.text: The best feedback asks questions: 'How did you think that went?' People accept insights they discover themselves.

climax.text: Be direct but kind. Describe the behavior, explain the impact, and ask how they'd like to adjust going forward.

punchline.text: Skip the sandwich. Be specific, kind, and direct.

quiz.question: Why does the feedback sandwich often fail?
options: People see through it and the criticism feels like a trap
